mapper.sql: maintenance_log_id AS "maintenanceLogId",enclosure AS "enclosure",maintenance_detail_id AS "maintenanceDetailId", maintenance_id AS "maintenanceId", inkind_id AS "inkindId", sku_id AS "skuId", brand_id AS "brandId", number AS "number", create_user AS "createUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_user AS "updateUser", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_maintenance_log where 1 = 1
and maintenance_log_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.maintenanceLogId},'%')
and inkind_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.inkindId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and sku_id in
#{state}
and brand_id in
#{state}
